component.text: AutoSecure Versus SDM Security Audit One-Step Lockdown

Cisco AutoSecure also:
  • Disables NTP
  • Configures AAA
  • Sets SPD values
  • Enables TCP intercepts
  • Configures anti-spoofing ACLs on outside-facing interfaces

SDM implements some the following features differently:
  • SNMP is disabled but will not configure SNMPv3 (varies with router).
  • SSH is enabled and configured with Cisco IOS images that support this feature.
  • Secure Copy Protocol (SCP) is not enabled; unsecure FTP is enabled.
